explanation: formal; threatening to do something bad or to hurt someone
sentence: He gave me a baleful look.

explanation: to prevent someone from doing something or to make someone less enthusiastic about doing something by making it difficult for that person to do it or by threatening bad results if they do it
sentence: These measures are designed to deter an enemy attack.
sentence_gap: These measures are designed to _____ an enemy attack.

explanation: to say that you know nothing about something, or that you have no responsibility for or connection with something
sentence: She tried to disavow her past.
He was portrayed in the media as a complete fiend.
sentence_gap: He was portrayed in the media as a complete _____.

explanation: a relative who lived in the past; literary
sentence: How the world has changed: occasionally we rediscover long-forgotten truths that our forebears knew well.
sentence_gap: How the world has changed: occasionally we rediscover long-forgotten truths that our _________ knew well.

explanation: not clear in shape or sound
sentence: Is the picture always fuzzy on your TV?
sentence_gap: Is the picture always _____ on your TV?

explanation: what something seems to be, although it is not; formal
sentence: The men who arrived in the guise of drug dealers were actually undercover police officers.
sentence_gap: The men who arrived in the _____ of drug dealers were actually undercover police officers.

explanation: formal; to experience something, usually something unpleasant, as a result of actions you have taken
sentence: She had incurred the wrath of her father by marrying without his consent
sentence_gap: She had ________ the wrath of her father by marrying without his consent

explanation: to repair an engine, machine, etc. so that every part of it works as it should; to completely change a system so that it works more effectively
a competition for young women in which they are judged on their beauty and other qualities
sentence: Between games, the traditional pageantry includes the parade of champions.
sentence_gap: Between games, the traditional _________ includes the parade of champions.

explanation: a person who is easily shocked by rude things, especially those of a sexual type
faeces (= solid body waste) left by animals
sentence: The bear scat was analysed and found to come from a grizzly.
sentence_gap: The bear ____ was analysed and found to come from a grizzly.

explanation: to move quickly and smoothly in the sky, or to move quickly up into the sky
sentence: The birds were soaring high above.
By tacit agreement, the subject was never mentioned again.
sentence_gap: By _____ agreement, the subject was never mentioned again.

sentence: The thorny issue of illegal immigration remains unresolved.
sentence_gap: The ______ issue of illegal immigration remains unresolved.
